item.title: New NLG Resources: Sale and January 26 Webinar
item.description: We’re excited to start 2016 by putting our Natural Language Generation (NLG) report and prototype on sale! We’re offering multiple packages, including a short report focused on business value for C-level executives. NLG is a technology that allows software systems to write articles and reports. Our RoboRealtor prototype shows how to use NLG to generate real estate ads from a few apartment attributes (e.g., number of bedrooms and bathrooms, location, onsite gym facilities, etc.
